headline: Is American Electric Power Company (AEP) Pricing Look Attractive After Strong Multi‑Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether American Electric Power Company is fairly priced or offering value right now, it helps to first ground the discussion in what the market has been doing with the stock. The share price recently closed at US$121.10, with returns of 0.4% over 7 days, 3.6% over 30 days, 4.6% year to date, 22.8% over 1 year, 49.8% over 3 years, and 85.8% over 5 years. This gives useful context before you weigh any valuation work. Recent news coverage around American Electric Power...
